member.name: M:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IIntrospectionClient.DownloadSchemaAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads the schema information from a GraphQL server and writes it as GraphQL SDL to the given stream.
member.param: The HttpClient that shall be used to execute the introspection query.
The stream to which the schema shall be written to.

member.name: M:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IIntrospectionClient.DownloadSchemaAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads the schema information from a GraphQL server and returns the schema syntax tree.
member.param: The HttpClient that shall be used to execute the introspection query.
member.returns: Returns a parsed GraphQL schema syntax tree.

member.name: M:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IIntrospectionClient.GetSchemaFeaturesAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the supported GraphQL features from the server by doing an introspection query.
member.param: The HttpClient that shall be used to execute the introspection query.
member.returns: Returns an object that indicates what features are supported.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.Properties.IntroResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.Properties.IntroResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.Properties.IntroResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.Properties.IntroResources.Type_NotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type definition is not yet supported..
